response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its category. It's designed to meet your needs and enhance your experience in a way that's unparalleled. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than its face value. For this exceptional product, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $120. This is a fantastic opportunity to own something truly special at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal.", "product_price": 120}
